attributes.action: fund a nationwide high-speed train service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain needs a high-speed train link between its major cities, and thought should be given to high-speed trains reaching the entire nation by the 2012 Olympics. France has the TGV, Japan the Shinkansen, Germany the Maglev, China has it in Shanghai. Can the Prime Minister address the question: Why is Britain being left behind with regards to high-speed railway transport?
